document.full_text: frontpoint partners, a $4.5 billion hedge fund firm that became ensnared in a u.s. government insider trading probe last year, said it would shut down some of its portfolios.
document.title: hedge fund frontpoint to shut down several funds
lines_and_colors: frontpoint partners, a $4.5 billion hedge fund firm that became ensnared in a u.s. government insider trading probe last year, said it would shut down some of its portfolios.
